dmca.title: [EV1-C1954143N] Unauthorized Use of WESTERN UNIONR Mark(Our reference no. 2.25.35)

charset=UTF-8 Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable X-Declude-Sender: IPBrandProtection@westernunion.com [207.218.221.230] X-Spam-Tests-Failed: None [0] X-Note: This E-mail was sent from mx04.filter.theplanet.com ([207.218.221.230]). X-Virus-Scanned: by Barracuda Spam Firewall at ev1servers.net X-Barracuda-Spam-Score: 0.00 X-Barracuda-Spam-Status: No, SCORE=0.00 using global scores of TAG_LEVEL=4.0 QUARANTINE_LEVEL=1000.0 KILL_LEVEL=8.0 WHITELISTED Return-Path: IPBrandProtection@westernunion.com X-OriginalArrivalTime: 27 Nov 2006 23:38:21.0957 (UTC) FILETIME=[1FF2DB50:01C7127D] MIME element (text/html)

WESTERN UNION HOLDINGS, INC

12500 E. Belford Avenue,

Englewood, CO. 80112 U.S.A

11/27/2006
 

VIA EMAIL at abuse@ev1.net

ABUSE

390 Benmar, Suite 200 Houston TX, 77060


RE: Unauthorized Use of WESTERN UNION(r) Marks on  http://www.steroids-shop.com/  (Our reference no. 2.25.35)

To Whom It May Concern:


As indicated in our previous notice and request relating to unauthorized use of the WESTERN UNION Marks on the website at  http://www.steroids-shop.com/, Western Union Holdings, Inc. ("Western Union") does not permit use of its famous Marks without its express approval, especially in connection with online sales of pharmaceuticals without prescriptions. Further, as we also previously informed you, unauthorized use of the WESTERN UNION Marks violates Western Union?s intellectual property rights, as well as U.S. and international trademark law, because it is likely to confuse or deceive consumers as to whether Western Union is associated with, or approves of,  http://www.steroids-shop.com/ or the activities conducted through  http://www.steroids-shop.com/. Because sales of controlled pharmaceutical substances such as anabolic steroids violate U.S. law, Western Union expressly forbids use of its famous Marks in connection wi! th such activities.
 
We appreciate that you have attempted to comply with our previous request, but must inform you that the WESTERN UNION Marks include the words "WESTERN UNION" and/or the initials "WU" alone, the WESTERN UNION double-bar logo and the distinctive WESTERN UNION golden yellow and black trade dress ? as well as any marks, designs, or logos confusingly similar thereto, including variants, abbreviations, and misspellings of the words "WESTERN UNION."
 
Accordingly, we reiterate our request that  http://www.steroids-shop.com/ immediately cease all uses of the WESTERN UNION Marks and/or marks confusingly similar to the WESTERN UNION Marks, withdraw from publication and distribution any print, electronic, and other forms of promotional materials containing any form of the WESTERN UNION Marks and/or marks confusingly similar to the WESTERN UNION Marks (including uses in metatags, keywords or other "ad triggers," postURL or forwardin! g commands, hyperlinks, or any other electronic coding), and refrain f rom further use of any form of the WESTERN UNION Marks and/or marks confusingly similar thereto.
 
Please confirm your compliance with this request in writing, within fifteen (15) days of the date of this letter. Please be aware that your failure to take such action may expose you to the risk of civil and/or criminal liability.
 
This letter does not prejudice Western Union's rights and remedies related to this matter, which hereby are expressly reserved.
 
Sincerely,
Western Union Holdings, Inc. - Intellectual Property Group
12500 E. Belford Ave. M21A2
Englewood, Colorado 80112
Fax # 720-332-0219
 
This email is sent by the General Counsel's Office of The Western Union Company and may contain information that is privileged and/or confidential. If you are not the intended recipient, please notify the sender immediately and delete this e-mail and any attachments. Thank you.
